key.name: dimmed-opacity
key.description: The opacity level for minimized windows (0-100). 0 is completely transparent, 100 is completely opaque.

key.name: animation-duration
key.description: Duration of the fade animation in milliseconds.

key.name: enable-dimming
key.description: Whether to apply the dimming effect to minimized windows.

key.name: affect-all-windows
key.description: Whether to apply dimming to all window types including dialogs and popups, or just regular application windows.
